pageSubtitle: Nomad is a highly available, distributed, data-center aware cluster and application scheduler designed to support the modern datacenter with support for long-running services, batch jobs, and much more.

marketingContentBlocks.description: Learn how to use Nomad to schedule and orchestrate workloads.

marketingContentBlocks.title: Fundamentals
marketingContentBlocks.description: Become familiar with the core concepts of Nomad.

cards.title: Installing Nomad
cards.description: Nomad is available as a pre-compiled binary, a package for several OSs, or as source code for you to build from.

cards.title: Writing Job Specs
cards.description: The Nomad job specification or 'jobspec' is written in HCL and defines the schema for Nomad jobs.

cards.title: Agent Configuration
cards.description: The Nomad agent specification is written in HCL and defines configs like networking, plugins, and integrations.

cards.title: Manage Nomad Jobs
cards.description: Learn how to deploy and manage jobs.

marketingContentBlocks.title: Nomad Pack
marketingContentBlocks.description: Use Nomad Pack to deploy popular applications to Nomad.

cards.title: Introduction to Nomad Pack
cards.description: Learn about Nomad Pack and how to use it to easily create, share, deploy, and re-use Nomad job specs.

cards.title: Write a custom Nomad Pack
cards.description: Learn how to create your own custom Nomad Pack.

cards.title: Community Repository
cards.description: The registry of community-maintained packs for Nomad Pack.

marketingContentBlocks.title: Autoscaling
marketingContentBlocks.description: Automatically maintain your cluster and workload instance count to respond to demand while minimizing over-provisioning cost.

cards.title: Introduction to Autoscaling
cards.description: The Nomad Autoscaler is a horizontal application and cluster autoscaler for Nomad.

cards.title: Horizontal Cluster Autoscaling
cards.description: Learn how to use the autoscaler to dynamically scale infrastructure up and down and handle application load spikes.

cards.title: Create On-demand Batch Jobs
cards.description: Learn how to use the autoscaler to automatically provision and decommission clients for running batch jobs.

cards.title: Manage Job Placement and Affinities
cards.description: Learn how to use the affinity stanza to express job placement preferences.

marketingContentBlocks.title: Cluster Management
marketingContentBlocks.description: Learn the features operators will need to build and maintain Nomad clusters.

cards.title: Upgrade a Cluster
cards.description: Learn about the process of upgrading a cluster including upgrading in place.

cards.title: Enable Multi-Region Federation
cards.description: Learn how to use federation to allow users to submit jobs or interact with the API from any region attached to the cluster.

cards.title: Connect Nodes into a Cluster
cards.description: Learn how to connect nodes to a cluster manually, with Cloud Auto-Join, or with Consul.

cards.title: Enable Autopilot
cards.description: Learn about the Autopilot features and how to use them to cleanup servers, monitor Raft state, and introduce servers stably.
